body: Hi Xiaojian, As shown in the image below, if you connect the EP output component to the Run E+ component, you will get the output related to electricity used by lighting and equipment. Hope this clarifies. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UvkuBgtWUIx6J52ISDio9gCqCL1wQudMDOl*53mBPKOovw3bJZiFf4GdX6NN*k76a2KL6eDitCxsgPU-941SGMwgBn5dtqKi/Image4.png)
